programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Patrick Duffy (2/12/80)
programme.desc: Patrick Duffy says he always dreamed of becoming a TV star but now he wants to change his nice guy image.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Jimmy Stewart (12/11/80)
programme.desc: Oscar-winner James Stewart chats about his holiday shopping and plans for Christmas.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Kenneth Branagh (2/1/90)
programme.desc: Famed Shakespearean actor Kenneth Branagh talks about the thrill of meeting Kirk Douglas

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Carl Reiner (2/2/78)
programme.desc: Hollywood legend Carl Reiner stops by with his toupee. Plus, Jack Klugman talks examining dead bodies.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Chevy Chase (5/30/85)
programme.desc: To celebrate turning 40 Chevy Chase joins Johnny to talk about his new movie, Fletch.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Michael Douglas (2/21/92)
programme.desc: What a star-studded show. Elizabeth Taylor and Michael Douglas join Johnny.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Carl Reiner (10/18/74)
programme.desc: Carl Reiner talks about the World Series and his days in the Army! David Brenner covers LA earthquakes.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (8/25/87)
programme.desc: Joan Embery has to pry a Koala Bear from Johnny's arms.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Sylvester Stallone (5/21/82)
programme.desc: Rocky star Sylvester Stallone brings son Sage to meet Johnny.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Garry Shandling (4/28/83)
programme.desc: This time around Garry talks about turning 30, Chinese food and...sex education.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Christopher Reeve (7/26/79)
programme.desc: Superman himself Christopher Reeve describes taking acting classes with Robin Williams.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Dan Aykroyd (11/29/85)
programme.desc: This turbo-charged episode featured the comedy triumvirate of David Letterman, Chevy Chase and Dan Aykroyd.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Rosanna Arquette (11/7/86)
programme.desc: It's a fear-themed episode as Rosanna Arquette discusses her phobia of critics.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Rich Hall (5/4/83)
programme.desc: Rich wrote for Letterman, “Not Necessarily the News,” joined SNL. Shows mini spa, for dolls, in his bathroom.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Talk Show Greats - Jack Paar (12/17/87)
programme.desc: Jack Paar wanted to buy a Rolls Royce for his mother for just $5. Johnny reads kids' letters to Santa Claus.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - David Brenner (9/23/82)
programme.desc: David Brenner says people like stuff when it’s free. Discusses NYC, Italian identity. Claims to not enjoy E.T.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Super Dave Osborne (2/10/89)
programme.desc: Stand-up master Super Dave Osborne sends up President George Bush, VP Dan Quayle and….reggae music!
